name: eddy_combine
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Combines diffusion data sets with opposite phase encoding directions for use with FSL's EDDY.

inputs.description: Path to the positive phase-encoded data file (e.g. PosData.nii.gz)
inputs.name: Positive Data File

inputs.description: Path to the positive phase-encoded b-values file (e.g. Posbvals)
inputs.name: Positive B-values File

inputs.description: Path to the positive phase-encoded b-vectors file (e.g. Posbvecs)
inputs.name: Positive B-vectors File

inputs.description: Path to the negative phase-encoded data file (e.g. NegData.nii.gz)
inputs.name: Negative Data File

inputs.description: Path to the negative phase-encoded b-values file (e.g. Negbvals)
inputs.name: Negative B-values File

inputs.description: Path to the negative phase-encoded b-vectors file (e.g. Negbvecs)
inputs.name: Negative B-vectors File

inputs.description: Flag to include only matched volumes (set to 1 to include only matched volumes, otherwise 0)
inputs.name: Only Matched Volumes Flag

output-files.description: Combined positive and negative phase-encoded data
output-files.name: Combined Data File
